ej,zaung001,P,hirsj901,Call at HP ej,gibbj001,M,hirsj901,Call at HP HP umpire John Hirschbeck ruled that Jonny Gomes slid in under the tag of catcher Gregg Zaun; Zaun slammed his mask to the ground and was ejected by Hirschbeck; Blue Jays manager John Gibbons ran out and threw his hat down; he was ejected by Hirschbeck

umpchange,2,umphome,diazl901 umpchange,2,ump2b,(None) $Giambi breaks bat, heavy part hits umpire Foster on knee. He goes down immediately and game is delayed for 15 minutes while he is attended to. X-rays reveal bad bruise, but no break. Umpire Laz Diaz moves from 2b to plate.
umpchange,3,ump2b,fairc901 $Chad Fairchild enters to umpire at 2B. He had just arrived in Toronto to be a vacation replacement for Diaz following day
